OROLOGION.description: 冰冻所有敌人, 持续10秒。
OROLOGION.name: 时祷怀表

ROSARY.description: 消灭视野内的所有敌人。
ROSARY.name: 玫瑰念珠

TREASURE.description: 击败强敌后掉落, 可获得金币和宝物。
TREASURE.name: 宝箱

VACUUM.description: 收集所有留在地上的经验宝石。
VACUUM.name: 聚星宝珠

NFT.description: 可以让玩家暂时喷射锥形火焰, 受人物数值影响。
NFT.name: 辣香肠酱

RELIC_MAP.name: 星河图
RELIC_MAP.description: 永久解锁功能：在暂停菜单界面查看地图。

RELIC_TEAR.name: 女巫的眼泪
RELIC_TEAR.description: 永久解锁功能：在关卡选择界面调整时间倍速。

RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.description: 解锁秘能, 可以在开局时抽选秘法牌。
RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.name: 秘法牌

RELIC_BANGER.description: 永久解锁功能：在关卡选择界面挑选音乐。
RELIC_BANGER.name: 热歌香肠

GILDED.description: 收集所有留在地上的金币, 然后开启一轮淘金狂潮。
GILDED.name: 镶金三叶草

RELIC_GLASSMASK.name: 玻璃护面
RELIC_GLASSMASK.description: 可以在所有关卡中召唤商人。

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: 金蛋
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: 小幅提升当前角色的某一项随机属性, 永久有效。

RELIC_YELLOW.name: 黄色秘符
RELIC_YELLOW.description: 可以侦测任意关卡中的隐藏道具, 永久有效。

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: 邪恶秘典
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: 永久解锁功能：在暂停菜单界面查看已发现的武器进化组合。

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: 变装胡子
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: 永久解锁功能：更改角色的外观 (如允许) 和可携带的武器数量上限。

RELIC_GOUDA.name: 巫术艺典
RELIC_GOUDA.description: 永久解锁功能：在主菜单中查看已经击败过的敌人数量。

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: 福音书
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: 永久解锁功能：突破武器的等级上限, 可以在关卡选择界面进行开关。

RELIC_SECRETS.name: 莫尔恩的禁忌卷轴
RELIC_SECRETS.description: 永久解锁功能：可以在主菜单中施放魔咒, 并查看秘密列表。

PURIFY.name: 月咒火焰
PURIFY.description: 永久移除最多100份金蛋增益, 此操作不可撤销。

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: 第七号角
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: 永久解锁功能：禁用所有死神, 开启无限战斗。

RELIC_MIRROR.name: 格拉西娅的魔镜
RELIC_MIRROR.description: 永久解锁功能：可以用一种更困难的方式体验任意关卡。

ALWAYS_COINBAG2.name: [总是] 大钱袋
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.tips: 在其余的跑步中总是选择。

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [总是] 烤鸡
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: 在其余的跑步中，如果缺失健康，总是会选择硬币。

COIN.description: Adds 1 to your Gold coins total.
COIN.name: Gold Coin

COINBAG1.description: Adds 10 to your Gold coins total.
COINBAG1.name: Coin Bag

COINBAG2.description: Adds 25 to your Gold coins total.
COINBAG2.name: Big Coin Bag

COINBAGMAX.description: Adds 100 to your Gold coins total.
COINBAGMAX.name: Rich Coin Bag

OROLOGION.description: Freezes all enemies in time for 10 seconds.
OROLOGION.name: Orologion

TREASURE.description: Awards coins and Power ups. Dropped by strong enemies.
TREASURE.name: Treasure Chest

VACUUM.description: Gathers all Experience gems left on the ground.
VACUUM.name: Vacuum

NFT.description: Temporarily emits cones of flames. Affected by player stats.
NFT.name: Nduja Fritta

RELIC_MAP.name: Milky Way Map
RELIC_MAP.description: Permanently enables the map in the pause menu.

RELIC_TEAR.name: Sorceress' Tears
RELIC_TEAR.description: Permanently allows speeding up time in Stage Selection.

RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.description: Enables the unlocking and activation of Arcanas.
RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.name: Randomazzo

RELIC_BANGER.description: Permanently allows changing music in Stage Selection.
RELIC_BANGER.name: Magic Banger

GILDED.description: Gathers all Gold left on the ground and starts a Gold Fever.
GILDED.name: Gilded Clover

RELIC_GLASSMASK.name: Glass Vizard
RELIC_GLASSMASK.description: Summons the merchant in all stages.

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: Golden Egg
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: Permanently improves a random stat for the current character, by a tiny amount.

RELIC_YELLOW.name: Yellow Sign
RELIC_YELLOW.description: Permanently allows the detection of hidden items in all stages.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: Grim Grimoire
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: Permanently allows to peek at discovered weapon evolutions and unions from the pause menu.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Mindbender
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: Permanently allows to change character appearance (where applicable) and maximum weapon loadout.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Ars Gouda
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Permanently allows to access the list of defeated enemies from the main menu.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Great Gospel
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Permanently allows to level up weapons beyond their limit. Can be enabled in Stage Selection.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Forbidden Scrolls of Morbane
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Permanently allow you to cast spells and to access the list of secrets from the main menu.

PURIFY.name: Flames of Moonspell
PURIFY.description: Permanently remove up to 100 random Golden Egg bonuses. This cannot be undone.

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: Seventh Trumpet
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: Permanently allows to disable all reapers and fight endlessly.

RELIC_MIRROR.name: Gracia's Mirror
RELIC_MIRROR.description: Permanently allows to access a harder version of any stage.

ALWAYS_COINBAG2.name: [Always] Big Coin Bag
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.description: Adds 25 to your gold coins total.
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.tips: Always picked, for the rest of the run.

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [Always] Floor Chicken
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: Always picked over coins if missing health, for the rest of the run.

COINBAGMAX.name: Grand sac d'or
COINBAGMAX.tips: La chance affecte le taux d'apparition.

OROLOGION.description: Immobilise tous les ennemis pendant 10 secondes.
OROLOGION.name: Orologion
OROLOGION.tips: La chance affecte le taux d'apparition.

ROAST.name: Poulet rôti
ROAST.tips: La chance affecte le taux d'apparition.

ROSARY.name: Chapelet
ROSARY.tips: La chance affecte le taux d'apparition.

TREASURE.description: Rempli de pièces et de bonus. Laissé par les ennemis puissants.
TREASURE.name: Coffre au trésor

VACUUM.description: Récupère toutes les gemmes d'expérience au sol.
VACUUM.name: Vortex
VACUUM.tips: La chance affecte le taux d'apparition.

NFT.description: Crache temporairement des flammes en cône. Les stats du personnage l'affectent.
NFT.name: Nduja Fritta
NFT.tips: La chance affecte le taux d'apparition.

RELIC_MAP.name: Carte de la Voie lactée
RELIC_MAP.description: Active de façon permanente la carte dans le menu pause.

RELIC_TEAR.name: Larmes de la sorcière
RELIC_TEAR.description: Permet d'activer le mode course dans la sélection du niveau.

RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.description: Permet de débloquer et activer les Arcanes.
RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.name: Randomazzo

RELIC_BANGER.description: Permet de changer la musique dans la sélection du niveau.
RELIC_BANGER.name: Magie FM

GILDED.description: Récupère tout l'or au sol et déclenche une Pluie d'or.
GILDED.name: Trèfle doré

RELIC_GLASSMASK.name: Vizard de verre
RELIC_GLASSMASK.description: Fait apparaître le marchand dans tous les niveaux.

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: Œuf doré
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: Améliore très légèrement et de façon permanente une stat aléatoire de votre personnage.

RELIC_YELLOW.name: Signe jaune
RELIC_YELLOW.description: Permet de détecter les objets cachés dans tous les niveaux.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: Livre délivré
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: Permet de consulter les évolutions et fusions des armes découvertes dans le menu pause.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Caméléon
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: Permet de modifier l'apparence de votre personnage (si possible) et le nombre maximum d'armes.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Ars Gouda
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Débloque un accès permanent à la liste des ennemis éliminés depuis le menu principal.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Gospel divin
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Débloque la possibilité permanente d'améliorer les armes une fois leur limite atteinte. À activer dans la sélection du niveau.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Parchemins défendus de Morbane
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Débloque la possibilité permanente de jeter des sorts et d'accéder à la liste des secrets depuis le menu principal.

PURIFY.name: Flammes de Sortilune
PURIFY.description: Supprime jusqu'à 100 bonus d'Œuf doré aléatoires de manière permanente. Cette action est irréversible.

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: Septième trompette
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: Débloque la possibilité permanente de désactiver les Faucheuses pour vous battre indéfiniment.

RELIC_MIRROR.name: Miroir de Gracia
RELIC_MIRROR.description: Débloque un accès permanent à des versions plus difficiles de tous les niveaux.

ALWAYS_COINBAG2.name: [Toujours] Sac d'or
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.tips: Toujours choisi, pour le reste de la course.

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [Toujours] Poulet rôti
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: Toujours choisi sur des pièces en cas de santé, pour le reste de la course.

CLOVER.description: Nimm es auf, um 10% mehr Glück zu haben.
CLOVER.name: Kleeblättchen

COIN.description: Erhöht die Anzahl deiner Goldmünzen um 1.
COIN.name: Goldmünze

COINBAG1.description: Erhöht die Anzahl deiner Goldmünzen um 10.
COINBAG1.name: Münzsack

COINBAG2.description: Erhöht die Anzahl deiner Goldmünzen um 25.
COINBAG2.name: Großer Münzsack

COINBAGMAX.description: Erhöht die Anzahl deiner Goldmünzen um 100.
COINBAGMAX.name: Praller Münzsack
COINBAGMAX.tips: Die Drop-Rate hängt vom Glück ab.

OROLOGION.description: Friert alle Gegner für 10 Sekunden in der Zeit ein.
OROLOGION.name: Orologion
OROLOGION.tips: Die Drop-Rate hängt vom Glück ab.

ROAST.name: Brathähnchen
ROAST.tips: Die Drop-Rate hängt vom Glück ab.

ROSARY.name: Rosenkranz
ROSARY.tips: Die Drop-Rate hängt vom Glück ab.

TREASURE.description: Gewährt Münzen und Power-ups. Wird von starken Gegnern fallen gelassen.
TREASURE.name: Schatztruhe
TREASURE.tips: Die Qualität hängt vom Glück ab.

VACUUM.description: Sammelt alle Erfahrungsedelsteine ein, die auf dem Boden liegen.
VACUUM.name: Vakuum
VACUUM.tips: Die Drop-Rate hängt vom Glück ab.

NFT.description: Setzt vorübergehend Flammenkegel frei. Von den Werten des Spielers abhängig.
NFT.name: Nduja Fritta
NFT.tips: Die Drop-Rate hängt vom Glück ab.

RELIC_MAP.name: Karte der Milchstraße
RELIC_MAP.description: Aktiviert dauerhaft die Karte im Pausenmenü.

RELIC_TEAR.name: Tränen der Zauberin
RELIC_TEAR.description: Ermöglicht dauerhaft das Beschleunigen der Zeit in der Stage-Auswahl.

RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.description: Ermöglicht das Freischalten und Aktivieren von Arcanas.
RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.name: Randomazzo

RELIC_BANGER.description: Ermöglicht dauerhaft das Wechseln der Musik in der Stage-Auswahl.
RELIC_BANGER.name: Magischer Banger

GILDED.description: Sammelt alles Gold ein, das auf dem Boden liegt, und startet einen Goldrausch.
GILDED.name: Vergoldetes Kleeblatt

RELIC_GLASSMASK.name: Glas-Vizard
RELIC_GLASSMASK.description: Ruft in allen Stages den Händler herbei.

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: Goldenes Ei
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: Verbessert einen zufälligen des aktuellen Charakters minimal.

RELIC_YELLOW.name: Gelbes Schild
RELIC_YELLOW.description: Ermöglicht dauerhaft das Entdecken geheimer Items in allen Stages.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: Grimmiges Grimoire
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: Ermöglicht dauerhaft einen Blick auf entdeckte Waffenverbesserungen und -vereinigungen im Pausenmenü.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Geisterweiterer
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: Ermöglicht dauerhaft das Verändern des Charakteraussehens (wo möglich) und der maximalen Waffenkonfiguration.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Ars Gouda
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Gewährt dauerhaften Zugriff auf die Liste besiegter Gegner über das Hauptmenü.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Frohe Kunde
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Erlaubt dauerhaft das Aufleveln von Waffen über ihr Limit hinaus. Kann in der Stage-Auswahl aktiviert werden.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Verbotene Schriftrollen von Morbane
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Erlauben dauerhaft das Wirken von Zaubern und gewähren über das Hauptmenü Zugriff auf die Liste der Geheimnisse.

PURIFY.name: Flammen des Mondzaubers
PURIFY.description: Entfernen dauerhaft bis zu 100 zufällige Goldenes-Ei-Boni. Kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden.

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: Siebente Trompete
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: Erlaubt dauerhaft das Deaktivieren aller Schnitter und das endlose Kämpfen.

RELIC_MIRROR.name: Gracias Spiegel
RELIC_MIRROR.description: Gewährt dauerhaft den Zugang zu einer schwereren Version einer beliebigen Stage.

ALWAYS_COINBAG2.name: [Stets] Großer Münzsack
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.description: Erhöht die Anzahl deiner Goldmünzen um 25.
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.tips: Immer gepflückt, für den Rest des Laufs.

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [Stets] Brathähnchen
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: Für den Rest des Laufs immer Münzen übernommen, wenn sie Gesundheit fehlt.

CLOVER.description: Raccoglilo per ottenere il 10% in più di fortuna.
CLOVER.name: Trifoglietto

COIN.description: Aggiunge 1 moneta d'oro al tuo totale.
COIN.name: Moneta d'oro

COINBAG1.description: Aggiunge 10 monete d'oro al tuo totale.
COINBAG1.name: Sacchetto d'oro

COINBAG2.description: Aggiunge 25 monete d'oro al tuo totale.
COINBAG2.name: Sacchetto colmo d'oro

COINBAGMAX.description: Aggiunge 100 monete d'oro al tuo totale.
COINBAGMAX.name: Sacchetto stracolmo d'oro
COINBAGMAX.tips: La Fortuna influenza la possibilità di trovarla.

OROLOGION.description: Congela tutti i nemici per 10 secondi.
OROLOGION.name: Orologion
OROLOGION.tips: La Fortuna influenza la possibilità di trovarlo.

ROAST.name: Pollo sul pavimento
ROAST.tips: La Fortuna influenza la possibilità di trovarlo.

ROSARY.description: Elimina tutti i nemici nel campo visivo.
ROSARY.name: Rosario
ROSARY.tips: La Fortuna influenza la possibilità di trovarlo.

TREASURE.description: Ricompensa con monete e potenziamenti. Elimina i nemici più potenti per trovarlo.
TREASURE.name: Forziere del tesoro
TREASURE.tips: La Fortuna ne influenza la qualità.

VACUUM.description: Attira tutte le Gemme dell'esperienza rimaste al suolo.
VACUUM.name: Risucchio
VACUUM.tips: La Fortuna influenza la possibilità di trovarlo.

NFT.description: Emette temporaneamente coni di fiamme. Influenzata dalle statistiche del personaggio.
NFT.name: Nduja fritta
NFT.tips: La Fortuna influenza la possibilità di trovarla.

RELIC_MAP.name: Mappa della via Lattea
RELIC_MAP.description: Abilita permanentemente la mappa nel menu di pausa.

RELIC_TEAR.name: Lacrime di strega
RELIC_TEAR.description: Permette permanentemente di aumentare la velocità nella selezione del livello.

RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.description: Permette di sbloccare e attivare gli Arcani.
RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.name: Randomazzo

RELIC_BANGER.description: Permette permanentemente di cambiare la musica nella selezione del livello.
RELIC_BANGER.name: Pezzone magico

GILDED.description: Attira tutto l'oro rimasto al suolo e dà inizio alla Febbre dell'oro.
GILDED.name: Trifoglio dorato

RELIC_GLASSMASK.name: Vizard di vetro
RELIC_GLASSMASK.description: Evoca il mercante in tutti i livelli.

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: Uovo d'oro
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: Migliora leggermente in maniera permanente una statistica a caso del personaggio attuale.

RELIC_YELLOW.name: Segno giallo
RELIC_YELLOW.description: Permette permanentemente di rilevare degli oggetti nascosti in tutti i livelli.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: Grimorio del martirio
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: Permette permanentemente di dare un'occhiata nel menu di pausa alle evoluzioni e unioni delle armi scoperte.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Mindbender
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: Permette permanentemente di modificare l'aspetto (se possibile) e l'equipaggiamento massimo dell'arma del personaggio.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Ars Gouda
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Garantisce l'accesso permanente all'elenco dei nemici sconfitti dal menu principale.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Buona novella
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Permette permanentemente il miglioramento delle armi oltre il loro limite. Si può attivare dalla selezione del livello.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Pergamene proibite di Morbane
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Permette permanentemente il lancio di incantesimi e l'accesso all'elenco dei segreti dal menu principale.

PURIFY.name: Fiamme di Lunamagica
PURIFY.description: Rimuove definitivamente fino a 100 bonus casuali dell'Uovo d'oro. Quest'azione è irreversibile.

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: Settima tromba
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: Consente di disabilitare definitivamente tutti i mietitori e di combattere all'infinito.

RELIC_MIRROR.name: Specchio di Gracia
RELIC_MIRROR.description: Garantisce l'accesso permanente a una versione più difficile di qualsiasi livello.

ALWAYS_COINBAG2.name: [Sempre] Sacchetto colmo d'oro
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.description: Aggiunge 25 monete d'oro al tuo totale.
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.tips: Toujours Choisi, Pour le Reste de la Course.

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [Sempre] Pollo sul pavimento
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: Sempre scelto se mancano HP, per il resto della partita.

COINBAGMAX.name: 大金の金貨袋
COINBAGMAX.tips: 運の能力値に応じてドロップ率が変化。

OROLOGION.description: 10秒間すべての敵の時間を止める。
OROLOGION.name: 懐中時計
OROLOGION.tips: 運の能力値に応じてドロップ率が変化。

ROAST.name: トリ肉
ROAST.tips: 運の能力値に応じてドロップ率が変化。

ROSARY.description: 画面内にいる敵をすべて倒す。
ROSARY.name: ロザリオ
ROSARY.tips: 運の能力値に応じてドロップ率が変化。

TREASURE.description: 金貨とパワーアップが得られる。 強い敵を倒すとドロップするアイテム。
TREASURE.name: 宝箱
TREASURE.tips: 運の能力値に応じて箱の中身が変化。

VACUUM.description: 落ちているEXPジェムをすべて回収する。
VACUUM.name: 吸引のオーブ
VACUUM.tips: 運の能力値に応じてドロップ率が変化。

NFT.description: 一定時間, 炎を放射する。 ステータスに応じて効果が強化される。
NFT.name: ンドゥヤ・フリッタ
NFT.tips: 運の能力値に応じてドロップ率が変化。

RELIC_MAP.name: 天の川の地図
RELIC_MAP.description: ポーズメニューでマップが表示される。
RELIC_MAP.achievementTips: ポーズメニューマップ

RELIC_TEAR.name: 魔女の涙
RELIC_TEAR.description: ステージ選択時, お急ぎモードが選べる。

RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.description: ステージ選択時, アルカナモードが選べる。
RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.name: 数奇のカード

RELIC_BANGER.description: ステージ選択時, ステージ音楽が選べる。
RELIC_BANGER.name: 魔法の楽器

GILDED.description: 落ちている金貨がすべて回収されたのちに, ゴールドフィーバーが発生する。
GILDED.name: 金箔のクローバー

RELIC_GLASSMASK.name: ガラスのお面
RELIC_GLASSMASK.description: 全ステージで商人を呼び出せるようになる。

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: 黄金の卵
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: 現在のキャラクターからいずれかのステータスが, 極少量増加し続ける。

RELIC_YELLOW.name: 黄の印
RELIC_YELLOW.description: 全ステージで隠しアイテムが分かるようになる。
RELIC_YELLOW.achievementTips: ステージの隠しアイテム

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: 魔導書
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: ポーズメニューから, 見つけた武器の進化と融合の条件を確認できる。

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: 鼻付き眼鏡
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: キャラクターの外見 (カスタマイズ可能なキャラに限り) と, 武器の最大所持数を変更できる。

RELIC_GOUDA.name: アルス・ゴーダ
RELIC_GOUDA.description: 常時, メインメニューから倒した敵のリストにアクセスできるようになる。

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: 大いなる福音
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: 常時, 武器の上限を超えたレベルアップを可能とする。 ステージ選択で有効にできる。

RELIC_SECRETS.name: モルベインの禁じられた巻物
RELIC_SECRETS.description: 常時, メインメニューから呪文を唱え, シークレットのリストにアクセスできるようにする。

PURIFY.name: ムーンスペルの炎
PURIFY.description: 金の卵のボーナスを最大100個まで永久に削除する。 取消し不可。

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: 第七のラッパ吹き
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: すべての死神を永久に無効化し, 無限に戦えるようになる。

RELIC_MIRROR.name: グラシアの鏡
RELIC_MIRROR.description: すべてのステージのハードバージョンにアクセスできる。

ALWAYS_COINBAG2.name: [いつも] 大きな金貨袋
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.tips: 残りのランのために、常に選んだ。

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [いつも] トリ肉
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: 残りの走りのために、健康が欠けている場合は常にコインを選んでください。

TREASURE.description: 골드와 무작위 파워 업을 획득합니다. 강력한 적에게서만 획득할 수 있습니다.
TREASURE.name: 보물상자
TREASURE.tips: 행운이 높을수록 많은 아이템과 골드를 획득할 수 있습니다.

NFT.description: 바라보는 방향으로 화염을 방사합니다. 플레이어 스탯에 영향을 받습니다.
NFT.name: 은두자 프리타

RELIC_MAP.name: 은하수 지도
RELIC_MAP.description: 일시정지 화면에서 지도를 활성화하여 필드의 아이템 위치를 표시합니다.

RELIC_TEAR.name: 마녀의 눈물
RELIC_TEAR.description: 스테이지 선택에서 게임을 영구적으로 가속할 수 있습니다.

RELIC_BANGER.description: 스테이지 선택에서 음악을 영구적으로 변경할 수 있습니다.
RELIC_BANGER.name: 매직 뱅어

GILDED.description: 땅에 떨어진 모든 금화를 흡수하며 황금의 피버타임을 가집니다.
GILDED.name: 금박 클로버

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: 황금알
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: 현재 플레이 중인 캐릭터의 무작위 능력치 한 가지를 영구적으로 소폭 증가시킵니다.

RELIC_YELLOW.name: 노란색 신호
RELIC_YELLOW.description: 모든 스테이지에서 숨겨진 아이템을 영구적으로 감지할 수 있습니다.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: 그림 그리모어
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: 일시 정지 메뉴에서 발견한 무기 진화, 조합법을 영구적으로 확인할 수 있습니다.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: 코주부 안경
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: 캐릭터의 외형을 변경 가능하게 해줍니다. 또한 게임 시작 전에 소지 가능한 최대 무기의 수량을 지정할 수 있습니다.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: 괴물 도감
RELIC_GOUDA.description: 메인 메뉴에서 처치한 적의 목록을 영구적으로 확인할 수 있습니다.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: 위대한 복음
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: 영구적으로 무기의 레벨을 한계 이상으로 올릴 수 있습니다. 스테이지 선택에서 활성화할 수 있습니다.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: 모르베인의 금지된 두루마리
RELIC_SECRETS.description: 주문을 시전하고 메인 메뉴에서 비밀 목록을 확인할 수 있습니다.

PURIFY.name: 문스펠의 불꽃
PURIFY.description: 무작위 황금알 보너스를 최대 100개 영구적으로 제거합니다. 이는 실행 취소할 수 없습니다.

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: 일곱 번째 나팔
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: 영구적으로 모든 사신을 비활성화하고 무한으로 전투할 수 있도록 합니다.

RELIC_MIRROR.name: 그라시아의 거울
RELIC_MIRROR.description: 영구적으로 원하는 스테이지의 더 어려운 버전을 이용할 수 있습니다.

ALWAYS_COINBAG2.name: [언제나] 큰 금화 주머니
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.tips: 나머지 달리기를 위해 항상 골라 냈습니다.

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [언제나] 치킨
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: 나머지 달리기 동안 건강이 누락되면 항상 동전을 골랐습니다.

OROLOGION.description: Na 10 sekund zamraża wszystkich wrogów w czasie.
OROLOGION.name: Orologion

ROSARY.description: Niszczy wszystkich wrogów w zasięgu wzroku.
ROSARY.name: Różaniec

TREASURE.description: Nagrody w postaci monet i wzmocnień. Upuszczane przez silnych wrogów.
TREASURE.name: Skrzynia skarbów

VACUUM.description: Zbiera wszystkie Klejnoty doświadczenia leżące na ziemi.
VACUUM.name: Próżnia

NFT.description: Co jakiś czas emituje stożki płomieni. Zależy od statystyk gracza.
NFT.name: Nduja Fritta

RELIC_MAP.name: Mapa drogi mlecznej
RELIC_MAP.description: Na stałe włącza mapę w menu pauzy.

RELIC_TEAR.name: Łzy czarodziejki
RELIC_TEAR.description: Na stałe umożliwia przyspieszenie czasu w obszarze Wybór etapu.

RELIC_BANGER.description: Na stałe umożliwia zmianę muzyki w obszarze Wybór etapu.
RELIC_BANGER.name: Magiczny banger

GILDED.description: Zbiera Złoto leżące na ziemi i rozpoczyna Gorączkę złota.
GILDED.name: Pozłacana koniczyna

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: Złote jajo
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: Na stałe ulepsza losowy parametr bieżącej postaci o niewielką wartość.

RELIC_YELLOW.name: Żółty znak
RELIC_YELLOW.description: Na stałe umożliwia wykrywanie ukrytych przedmiotów na wszystkich etapach.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: Ponury grymuar
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: Na stałe pozwala podglądać odkryte ulepszenia i połączenia broni w menu pauzy.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Hipnotyzer
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: Na stałe pozwala zmieniać wygląd postaci (jeśli to możliwe) i maksymalny ładunek broni.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Ars Gouda
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Na stałe umożliwia dostęp do listy pokonanych wrogów w menu głównym.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Wielka ewangelia
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Na stałe umożliwia zwiększanie poziomu broni powyżej limitów. Aktywowane w obszarze Wybór etapu.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Zakazane zwoje Morbane’a
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Na stałe umożliwia rzucanie zaklęć i dostęp do listy tajemnic z menu głównego.

PURIFY.name: Płomienie Moonspell
PURIFY.description: Na stałe usuwa do 100 losowych premii ze Złotych jaj. Nie można tego cofnąć.

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: Siódma trąba
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: Na stałe umożliwia wyłączenie wszystkich żniwiarzy i walkę bez końca.

RELIC_MIRROR.name: Lustro Gracii
RELIC_MIRROR.description: Na stałe umożliwia dostęp do trudniejszej wersji dowolnego etapu.

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [Zawsze] Kurczak
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: Zawsze wybierałem monety, jeśli brakuje zdrowia, przez resztę biegu.

COIN.description: Adiciona 1 moeda de ouro ao total.
COIN.name: Moeda de Ouro

COINBAG1.description: Adiciona 10 moedas de ouro ao total.
COINBAG1.name: Bolsa de Moedas

COINBAG2.description: Adiciona 25 moedas de ouro ao total.
COINBAG2.name: Bolsona de Moedas

COINBAGMAX.description: Adiciona 100 moedas de ouro ao total.
COINBAGMAX.name: Bolsa de Moedas Rica
COINBAGMAX.tips: A chance de aparecer depende da Sorte.

OROLOGION.description: Paralisa todos os inimigos por 10 segundos.
OROLOGION.name: Orologion
OROLOGION.tips: A chance de aparecer depende da Sorte.

ROAST.name: Frango Assado
ROAST.tips: A chance de aparecer depende da Sorte.

ROSARY.description: Destrói todos os inimigos na tela.
ROSARY.name: Rosário
ROSARY.tips: A chance de aparecer depende da Sorte.

TREASURE.description: Contém moedas e Aprimoramentos. Surge com a morte de inimigos fortes.
TREASURE.name: Baú do Tesouro

VACUUM.description: Recolhe todas as Joias de Experiência do chão.
VACUUM.name: Aspirador
VACUUM.tips: A chance de aparecer depende da Sorte.

NFT.description: Emite cones de chamas temporariamente. É afetada pelos atributos do jogador.
NFT.name: Nduja Fritta
NFT.tips: A chance de aparecer depende da Sorte.

RELIC_MAP.name: Mapa da Via Láctea
RELIC_MAP.description: Desbloqueia permanentemente o mapa no menu de pausa.

RELIC_TEAR.name: Lágrimas da Feiticeira
RELIC_TEAR.description: Permite na Seleção de fase que o tempo seja acelerado permanentemente.

RELIC_BANGER.description: Permite alterar a música na Seleção de fase permanentemente.
RELIC_BANGER.name: Sonzeira Mágica

GILDED.description: Recolhe todo ouro do chão e começa uma Febre de Ouro.
GILDED.name: Trevo Dourado

RELIC_GLASSMASK.name: Vizard de Vidro
RELIC_GLASSMASK.description: Invoca o Mercador em todas as fases.

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: Ovo Dourado
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: Melhora bem pouco um atributo aleatório do personagem atual permanentemente.

RELIC_YELLOW.name: Sinal Amarelo
RELIC_YELLOW.description: Permite a detecção de itens escondidos em todas as fases permanentemente.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: Grimório Grimpante
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: Permite ver as evoluções e uniões das armas descobertas no menu de pausa permanentemente.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Dobramente
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: Permite, permanentemente, a mudança de aparência do personagem (quando aplicável) e possibilita utilizar o limite máximo de armas.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Ars Gouda
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Permite acessar a lista de inimigos derrotados no menu principal.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Grande Gospel
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Permite subir o nível das armas para além do seu limite. É possível ativar na Seleção de fase.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Pergaminhos Proibidos de Morbane
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Permite lançar feitiços e acessar a lista de segredos do menu principal.

PURIFY.name: Chamas do Feitiço Lunar
PURIFY.description: Remove permanentemente até 100 bônus de Ovos Dourados aleatórios. Não pode ser desfeito.

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: Sétima Trombeta
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: Permite desativar todos os ceifadores e ativar a luta infinita.

RELIC_MIRROR.name: Espelho de Gracia
RELIC_MIRROR.description: Permite acessar uma versão mais difícil de qualquer fase.

ALWAYS_COINBAG2.name: [Sempre]Bolsona de Moedas
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.description: Adiciona 25 moedas de ouro ao total.
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.tips: Sempre escolhido, pelo resto da corrida.

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [Sempre] Frango Assado
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: Sempre escolhido por moedas se perder a saúde, pelo resto da corrida.

ROSARY.description: Уничтожает всех врагов в поле зрения.
ROSARY.name: Четки

TREASURE.description: Дает монеты и усиления. Выпадает из сильных врагов.
TREASURE.name: Сундук с сокровищами

VACUUM.description: Собирает все самоцветы опыта, оставшиеся на земле.
VACUUM.name: Вакуум

NFT.description: Временно испускает конус пламени. Зависит от характеристик игрока.
NFT.name: Ндуя фритта

RELIC_MAP.name: Карта Млечного пути
RELIC_MAP.description: Навсегда активирует карту в меню паузы.

RELIC_TEAR.name: Слезы чародейки
RELIC_TEAR.description: Позволяет ускорять время при выборе этапа.

RELIC_BANGER.description: Позволяет изменять музыку во время выбора этапа.
RELIC_BANGER.name: Волшебный расколбас

GILDED.description: Собирает все золото, оставшееся на земле и начинает Золотую лихорадку.
GILDED.name: Позолоченный клевер

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: Золотое яйцо
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: Слегка улучшает случайную характеристику текущего персонажа.

RELIC_YELLOW.name: Желтый знак
RELIC_YELLOW.description: Позволяет обнаруживать скрытые предметы на всех этапах.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: Смурной гримуар
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: Позволяет просматривать обнаруженные улучшения оружия и гибриды из меню паузы.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Мозголом
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: Позволяет изменять внешний вид персонажа (где это применимо) и макс. количество оружия.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Арс Гауда
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Дает постоянный доступ к списку побежденных врагов из главного меню.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Великое Писание
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Позволяет повышать уровень оружия даже выше предельного. Можно включить на выборе этапа.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Запретные свитки Морбейна
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Позволяет использовать заклинания и дает постоянный доступ к списку секретов из главного меню.

PURIFY.name: Пламя луночар
PURIFY.description: Убирает до 100 случайных бонусов золотых яиц. Это нельзя отменить.

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: Седьмой рупор
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: Позволяет убрать всех жнецов и сражаться бесконечно.

RELIC_MIRROR.name: Зеркало Грации
RELIC_MIRROR.description: Дает постоянный доступ к усложненной версии любого этапа.

ALWAYS_COINBAG2.name: [Всегда] Большой мешок денег
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.tips: Всегда выбирается, для остальной части пробега.

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [Всегда] Жареный цыпленок
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: Всегда выбирают монеты, если пропустить здоровье, для остальной части пробега.

COINBAGMAX.name: Gran saco de monedas
COINBAGMAX.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

OROLOGION.description: Congela a los enemigos durante 10 segundos.
OROLOGION.name: Reloj mágico
OROLOGION.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

ROAST.name: Pollo asado
ROAST.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

ROSARY.description: Acaba con los enemigos que aparecen en pantalla.
ROSARY.name: Rosario
ROSARY.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

TREASURE.description: Otorga monedas y mejoras. Botín de enemigos fuertes.
TREASURE.name: Cofre del tesoro
TREASURE.tips: La calidad depende de tu suerte.

VACUUM.description: Recoge las gemas de experiencia que haya en el suelo.
VACUUM.name: Aspiragemas
VACUUM.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

NFT.description: Libera salvas de fuego que cambian según los atributos del jugador.
NFT.name: Nduja Fritta
NFT.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

RELIC_MAP.name: Mapa de la Vía Láctea
RELIC_MAP.description: Activa el mapa de forma permanente en el menú de pausa.

RELIC_TEAR.name: Lágrimas de hechicera
RELIC_TEAR.description: Permite acelerar el tiempo de forma permanente al elegir la fase.

RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.description: Permite desbloquear y activar los arcanos.
RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.name: Azarmazzo

RELIC_BANGER.description: Permite cambiar la música de forma permanente al elegir la fase.
RELIC_BANGER.name: Tocadiscos mágico

GILDED.description: Recoge todo el oro del suelo y comienza una fiebre del oro.
GILDED.name: Trébol dorado

RELIC_GLASSMASK.name: Máscara de cristal
RELIC_GLASSMASK.description: Invoca al mercader en todas las fases.

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: Huevo de oro
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: Mejora en una pequeña cantidad un atributo al azar y de forma permanente del personaje actual.

RELIC_YELLOW.name: Signo amarillo
RELIC_YELLOW.description: Permite detectar los objetos ocultos de forma permanente en todas las fases.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: Grimorio mortuorio
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: Permite ver las evoluciones y las fusiones de armas ya descubiertas en el menú de pausa.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Cambio de aspecto
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: Permite cambiar la apariencia del personaje (siempre que se pueda) de forma permanente y la cantidad máxima de armas que puede llevar.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Ars gouda
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Te permite acceder de forma permanente a la lista de enemigos derrotados en el menú principal.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Gran Evangelio
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Te permite subir de nivel las armas más allá del límite de forma permanente. Se puede activar en la pantalla de elegir fase.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Pergaminos prohibidos de Morbane
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Te permite lanzar hechizos de forma permanente y acceder a la lista de secretos en el menú principal.

PURIFY.name: Llamas de hechizoluna
PURIFY.description: Elimina de forma permanente hasta 100 bonificaciones de huevo de oro al azar. No se puede deshacer.

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: Séptima trompeta
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: Te permite desactivar todas las Muertes y luchar eternamente.

RELIC_MIRROR.name: Espejo de Gracia
RELIC_MIRROR.description: Te permite acceder a una versión más difícil de cualquier fase.

ALWAYS_COINBAG2.name: [Siempre] Saco de monedas
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.tips: Siempre elegido, por el resto de la carrera.

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [Siempre] Pollo asado
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: Siempre recogía monedas si faltan salud, por el resto de la carrera.

TREASURE.description: Akçe ve Güçlendirmeler ile ödüllendirir. Güçlü düşmanlardan düşer.
TREASURE.name: Hazine Sandığı

VACUUM.description: Yerde bırakılan tüm Deneyim Mücevherlerini toplar.
VACUUM.name: Vakum

NFT.description: Geçici olarak alev konileri yayar. Oyuncu istatistiklerinden etkilenir.
NFT.name: Nduja Fritta

RELIC_MAP.name: Kehkeşan Haritası
RELIC_MAP.description: Duraklatma menüsünde haritayı kalıcı olarak etkinleştirir.

RELIC_TEAR.name: Sahire'nin Gözyaşları
RELIC_TEAR.description: Bölüm Seçiminde kalıcı olarak süreyi hızlandırmaya olanak sağlar.

RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.description: Arcana'ların kilidinin açılmasını ve etkinleştirilmesini sağlar.
RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.name: Randomazzo

RELIC_BANGER.description: Bölüm Seçiminde müziğin değiştirilmesine kalıcı olarak olanak sağlar.
RELIC_BANGER.name: Büyülü Teyp

GILDED.description: Yerde kalan tüm Altınları toplar ve bir Altın Kasırgası başlatır.
GILDED.name: Yaldızlı Yonca

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: Altın Yumurta
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: Mevcut karakter için rastgele bir istatistiği çok az miktarda kalıcı olarak geliştirir.

RELIC_YELLOW.name: Sarı İşaret
RELIC_YELLOW.description: Tüm bölümlerdekii gizli ögelerin algılanmasına kalıcı olarak olanak sağlar.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: Grim Grimoire
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: Duraklatma menüsünden keşfedilen silah evrimlerine ve birleşimlerine kalıcı olarak göz atmanıza olanak sağlar.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Zihinbüken
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: Kalıcı olarak karakter görünümünü (uygun yerlerde) ve maksimum silah teçhizatını değiştirmeye olanak sağlar.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Ars Gouda
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Ana menüden öldürülen düşmanların listesine kalıcı olarak erişmenizi sağlar.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Büyük İncil
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Silahların sınırlarının ötesinde seviye atlamasına kalıcı olarak izin verir. Bölüm Seçiminde etkinleştirilebilir.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Morbane'in Yasak Parşömenleri
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Büyü yapmanıza ve ana menüden sırlar listesine erişmenize kalıcı olarak izin verir.

PURIFY.name: Aybüyüsü'nün Alevleri
PURIFY.description: 100'e kadar rastgele Altın Yumurta bonusunu kalıcı olarak kaldırır. Bu geri alınamaz.

RELIC_TRUMPET.name: Yedinci Borazan
RELIC_TRUMPET.description: Tüm Azrailleri devre dışı bırakmaya ve sonsuz savaşmaya kalıcı olarak olanak tanır.

RELIC_MIRROR.name: Gracia'nın Aynası
RELIC_MIRROR.description: Kalıcı olarak herhangi bir bölümün daha zor bir versiyonuna erişmeye izin verir.

ALWAYS_COINBAG2.name: [Hep] Büyük Akçe Çuvalı
ALWAYS_COINBAG2.tips: Koşunun geri kalanı için her zaman seçildi.

ALWAYS_ROAST.name: [Hep] Gezmeyen Tavuk
ALWAYS_ROAST.tips: Koşunun geri kalanı için her zaman sağlıksızsa paraları seçti.
